range_publisher.py

1 import argparse
2 import numpy as np
3 
4 import rospy
5 import tf
6 from sensor_msgs.msg import Range
7 from std_msgs.msg import Bool
8 from tf import TransformListener
9 
10 
11 class RangePublisher:
12  def __init__(self, obstacle_position, topic_name='/proximity_data1'):
13  # Prepare publisher
14  self.obstacle_position = obstacle_position
15  self.proximity_publisher = rospy.Publisher(topic_name, Range, queue_size=10)
16  self.start_subscriber = rospy.Subscriber('/at_start_position', Bool, self.start_callback)
17  self.listener = TransformListener()
18  self.r = rospy.Rate(100)
19 
20  self.range_msg = Range()
21  self.range_msg.header.frame_id = topic_name
22  self.range_msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
23  self.range_msg.range = np.inf
24 
25  self.at_start_position = False
26 
27  def get_ee_position(self):
28  try:
29  (position, quaternion) = self.listener.lookupTransform("/world", "/panda_link8", rospy.Time(0))
30  return position
31  except (tf.LookupException, tf.ConnectivityException, tf.ExtrapolationException):
32  return None
33 
34  def start_callback(self, msg):
35  self.at_start_position = msg.data
36 
37  def spin(self):
38  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
39  ee_position = self.get_ee_position()
40 
41  if self.at_start_position and ee_position is not None:
42  distance = self.obstacle_position - ee_position
43  self.range_msg.range = np.linalg.norm(distance)
44 
45  self.proximity_publisher.publish(self.range_msg)
46  self.r.sleep()
47 
48 
49 def parse_arguments():
50  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
51  parser.add_argument('-ox', '--obstacle_x', type=float, default=0.3)
52  parser.add_argument('-oy', '--obstacle_y', type=float, default=-0.2)
53  parser.add_argument('-oz', '--obstacle_z', type=float, default=0.5)
54 
55  return parser.parse_args()
56 
57 
58 if __name__ == '__main__':
59  args = parse_arguments()
60 
61  # Init ROS Node
62  rospy.init_node('range_publisher', anonymous=True)
63 
64  obstacle_position = np.array([
65  args.obstacle_x,
66  args.obstacle_y,
67  args.obstacle_z
68  ])
69 
70  publisher = RangePublisher(obstacle_position)
71  publisher.spin()
